Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
This class is designed to mediate any necessary interactions between the Model and View (GUI) in the Apicius application. The primary functions of this controller are as follows:
  • Take a pantry/normal search query from the GUI, send it to the Model to search the database with, and return the Model's results to the GUI.
  • Send requests from the GUI to add, remove, or rearrange recipes in the user's favorite's list in the Model.
  • Send requests from the GUI to add or remove ingredients from the user's virtual pantry in the Model.
  • Return data structures from the Model such as the user's favorites list or virtual pantry.
  • Signal to the Model that it is time to save the user's data.
Author:
Katherine Wilson, Kyle Clements, Zachary Empkey

  • Field Details

    • model

      Model model
      Model that this Controller is designed to interact with. This model contains user data, app data, and tools for interacting with the recipe database.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(Model model)
      Creates a Controller object. A reference to the Model argument given will be stored as model and will act as the specific Model instance that this class interacts with.
      Parameters:
      model - Model instance associated with this Controller instance.

  • Method Details

    • searchRecipes

      public Recipe[] searchRecipes(String keyword)
      Forwards the given search query to the Model for a list of recipes with names that match the given keyword from the database.
      Parameters:
      keyword - Keyword used to search the Model's database.
      Returns:
      A list of Recipe objects with names that match the given query.

    • addToFavorites

      public boolean addToFavorites(Recipe recipe)
      Sends a recipe from the View to the Model to add to its user favorites list.
      Parameters:
      recipe - Recipe to be added to the user's favorites list.
      Returns:
      true if the Recipe was successfully added or
      false if the operation was unsuccessful.

    • removeFromFavorites

      public void removeFromFavorites(Recipe recipe)
      Sends a recipe from the View to the Model to remove from its user favorites list.
      Parameters:
      recipe - Recipe to be removed from the user's favorites list.

    • getFavorites

      public ArrayList<Recipe> getFavorites()
      Returns the user's favorites list from the Model.
      Returns:
      the list of Recipes that the user has added to their favorites list.

    • moveFavoriteUp

      public void moveFavoriteUp(Recipe recipe)
      Moves the given recipe up by one index in the user's favorites list.
      Parameters:
      recipe - Recipe to be moved up.

    • moveFavoriteDown

      public void moveFavoriteDown(Recipe recipe)
      Moves the given recipe down by one index in the user's favorites list.
      Parameters:
      recipe - Recipe to be moved down.

    • getAllIngredients

      public List<String> getAllIngredients()
      Returns a list of all possible ingredients across every recipe in the database.
      Returns:
      list of all ingredients as Strings.

    • addPantryItem

      public boolean addPantryItem(String item)
      Sends an ingredient to the Model to be added to the user's "virtual pantry".
      Parameters:
      item - String representing an ingredient in the database's ingredient's list.
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient was added successfully or
      false if the operation was unsuccessful.

    • removePantryItem

      public void removePantryItem(String item)
      Sends an ingredient to the Model to be removed from the user's "virtual pantry".
      Parameters:
      item - Ingredient to be removed from the user's virtual pantry.

    • getPantry

      public List<String> getPantry()
      Returns a list of all ingredients in the user's virtual pantry as Strings.
      Returns:
      a list of Strings representing the user's virtual pantry.

    • searchWithPantry

      public List<Recipe> searchWithPantry()
      Forwards a pantry search request to the Model. The Model will search its database for recipes with ingredients that the user's pantry contains. The results will be returned as a list of those Recipe objects.
      Returns:
      A list of Recipe objects that the user can make based on what's in their virtual pantry.

    • saveUserData

      public void saveUserData()
      Sends a signal to the Model that is time to save the user's data to the user data file.
